Html:
I tried to use GMap.Net in a WpfBrowserApplication. But after compile, a warning says: GMap.Net.Core.dll targets a different processor than the application. When I debug it, error happens.

I think GMap.NET does not support wpf browser app. Is that right?
you need target x86, but i doubt it works in browser, the main idea of this control is to work Outside browser in desktop
